0.title: Prologue

episode of.title: The New Adventures of Peter and Wendy (TV Series 2014– )

0.plot: It's the 154th anniversary of the founding of Neverland, Ohio, and no one is more excited about it than Peter Pan and his fairy, Tinker Bell.

1.title: Growing Up

episode of.title: The New Adventures of Peter and Wendy (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Wendy confesses her yearning for adventure outside Neverland as she records her advice vlog, Dear Darling, but gets interrupted when Peter comes in through her window.

2.title: Fudgeopolis

episode of.title: The New Adventures of Peter and Wendy (TV Series 2014– )

3.title: The Bossman Cometh

episode of.title: The New Adventures of Peter and Wendy (TV Series 2014– )

episode of.title: The New Adventures of Peter and Wendy (TV Series 2014– )

episode of.title: The New Adventures of Peter and Wendy (TV Series 2014– )

6.title: Post-Game

episode of.title: The New Adventures of Peter and Wendy (TV Series 2014– )

imdb.plot outline: Neverland Ohio is a magical place, and Peter Pan never wants to leave. Everything he needs is there, particularly his long time friend, Wendy Darling. But when their friendship begins to blossom into something more, and Wendy debates flying away, they're both left with some serious thinking to do.
imdb.title: The New Adventures of Peter and Wendy
akas: The New Adventures of Peter and Wendy (United States)
plot: Neverland Ohio is a magical place, and Peter Pan never wants to leave. Everything he needs is there, particularly his long time friend, Wendy Darling. But when their friendship begins to blossom into something more, and Wendy debates flying away, they're both left with some serious thinking to do.
